title: Can't reconnect to matches
body:
I have tried 13 times to reconnect to a game once it kicked me out in the initial loading screen.  My laptop has never had any trouble running LoL before, and now I can't connect.  It disconnects me at the 45% mark and tells me that there was an error.  I am using a msi GT 70.  Could somebody tell me how to fix this?

Thanks,
Enamena

replies.body:
Hi Enamena!

I completely understand how frustrating it can be to disconnect over and over again in the Loading Screen without knowing why.  Especially if it worked recently just fine.  Due to the fact that attachments are currently not enabled on replies, could you please submit a new ticket to us here at Player Support?

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new

When doing this, make sure that you include the following information in the ticket so we can investigate exactly why this is occurring:

1) Please send your most recent r3d log where you experienced the problem (You'll notice that the file name starts with the date/time and ends with r3dlog.txt): https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/22128450-League-of-Legends-Logs

2) Network Analysis: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20103436-obtaining-a-network-analysis

3) NetworkInfo Log: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132863-obtaining-a-networkinfo-log

4) Process List: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132988-obtaining-a-process-list

We should be hopefully able to resolve this issue ASAP! :)
